title: PGIMER Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for Project Technical Support Post
description: The Postgraduate Institute of Medical Education and Research (PGIMER) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Project Technical Support Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the 10th Pass, Diploma can apply for the PGIMER Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can attend the interview at the given...
